EmailTemplate.subject: Pharmacy License Renewal Application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
PHARMACY LICENCE RENEWAL APPLICATION
Dear {!customerName}
Please find attached the Pharmacy Licence Renewal Application form that you completed, which now needs to be signed by the Pharmacy Owner or Pharmacy Owner's Representative.
Please forward the application to this person before submitting it to the NSCP no later than November 30. The form can be submitted by mail, email (registrations@nspharmacists.ca), or fax (902-701-3540).
Thank you for your cooperation.
Please note: A pharmacy licence is not officially renewed until the NSCP has (1) received payment; (2) received the owner's signature on the Pharmacy Licence Renewal Application; and (3) approved the renewal application.
---
DO NOT REPLY TO THIS EMAIL. Please note that this email address (nscp@nspharmacists.ca) is used to generate mass emails from our database and messages sent to it are routed to an unmonitored mailbox. If you wish to contact us, please email (info@nspharmacists.ca) or call 902-422-8528 to ensure a timely response.
Nova Scotia College of Pharmacists 800 - 1801 Hollis Street Halifax, NS B3J 3N4
